__e: Stop it, it has nothing to do with it, moreover, is no longer my wife, we separated eight months ago.
My husband and I just separated recently and it hasn't been easy on the children, but...
Peter and I broke up a Iong time ago, and I wasn't at the party.
Look, Max, your aunt Sarah and I, yeah, we did like each other once, and then we stopped, and that's what happens.
